allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add certificate authority and certificate export functionality

- Added support for retrieving both external and local CA data objects
- Implemented certificate retrieval for local CAs with pagination support
- Added new output file for certificate and CA data \(Cert_Output.csv\)
- Added default values for host, user, pass, and output file parameters
- Fixed typo in comment: "Cllecting" -> "Collecting"
- Integrated auth string refresh in certificate retrieval loop

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
